item.description:
Please join the Red Sox Natives and other invited groups for a Kick-Off the 2013 Year Event at Laurie's 909 Steakhouse and Raw Bar in Wakefield on Thursday, January 3 after work.

1. There will be a Clown Shoes Beer Tasting starting at 7:00pm with a Clown Shoes Representative on site. For information on Clown Shoes Beer go to www.clownshoesbeeer.com

2. Stay for appetizers, dinner, a cocktail or two or three, socializing and more. If you have a group of people who want a table reservation for dinner please call Laurie's at 781-246-1909 and make a reservation. For more information on Laurie's 909 please go to www.lauries909.com.

3. Live entertainment will begin at approximately 8:30pm as Laurie's 909 welcomes Cool Change for their first performance of the year. For more information on Cool Change go to www.coolchangemusic.com.

4. Special guest Susan Baxter from Hire A Boston Wing Woman will be joining us for the evening. All men and women attending will be able to get a peak at the Wing Woman working her magic. For more information go to www.HireABostonWingWoman.com.

Get there when you can and stay as long as you're able. You're more than welcome to show up for all or part of the event.

Please RSVP if you wish to attend as this event will be capped due to space limitations. Participating Groups are:

1. Red Sox Natives (Frank and Jon)

2. Boston Happy Hour (Tonya)

3. Wakefield Weeknights (Melody)

4. North Shore Womens Group (Maria)

5. North Shore Separated & Divorced Group (Maria)

6. Girlfriends of The North Shore (Sharon)

7. Single Geeks, Nerds and Professionals (Alison)

If this will be your first time meeting the Red Sox Natives and Happy Hour Crew, check out the photos of those who RSVP Yes so you can find the group. If you do not have a recognizable real face photograph as your primary photo do not RSVP for the event. We reserve the right to limit and remove RSVPs.

Please remember to maintain your own tab or pay as you order and tip your servers. However, if you sit at a group table a group bill may be provided so please communicate with your server when ordering.

Laurie's 909 Steakhouse and Raw Bar is Wakefield's newest Restaurant and Bar with live entertainment several nights per week and Tuesday Night Trivia with Morgan White Jr. from WBZ Radio. Laurie's is located at the Wakefield Commuter Rail Train Station in Wakefield. The Reading and Haverhill Commuter Rail trains stop at Laurie's 909. Laurie's is easily accessible within 10 minutes from Routes 128, 93, 28 and 1. Free parking is available in two lots on Tuttle Street and on street. Check out the MBTA or Hop Stop for additional public transit options including the less reliable/infrequent 136 and 137 bus lines.

Say hello to Laurie and Bob when you visit.

Check out the "Penny Lane" Bar, the 9:09 and Beatles references.

More information at http://www.lauries909.com.

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the Red Sox Natives and Clown Shoes Tasting
item.name: Clown Shoes Beer/Tasting/Dinner/Cool Change at Laurie's 909 Steakhouse/Raw Bar
